name: DualRobbery
description:
Made for Hyper-Casual Jam #2 with the theme of Perspective Matters

For those of you coming from the Jam:

I ended up using pixel art because I didn't realize there was a restriction until I had made all the graphics for the game. RIP

Controls:

[A][D] - Move Camera

[Mouse Left Click] - Attack

[R] - Restart
